```{r}
pi <- function(n) {
  counter <- 0  
  for (i in 1:n) {  
      coordinates <- runif(2, min=-1, max=1) 
        if (sqrt(coordinates[1]^2 + coordinates[2]^2) < 1) { 
            counter <- counter + 1 
            } 
  } 
  return(4 * counter / n)
}

```
